os.fullpath: Operating System :: Emulation and API Compatibility :: Fink (Mac OS X)

name: Slackware on Darwin/OS X
short_description: The SlackDarwin project intends to build the free software packages for Mac OS X/Darwin on PowerPC based on Slackware Linux packaging system. SlackDarwin inherits KISS principle from Slackware Linux, and gives the user total control of package dependency.
